text: The 2019 European Parliament election for the election of the delegation from the Netherlands wil be held on May 23, 2019. This is the 9th time the elections have been held for the European elections in the Netherlands. == About the candidate lists == === Participation of political groups === thumb === Numbering of the candidates list === The official order and names of candidate lists: == Candidate lists == === Democrats 66 (D66) - ALDE === {| style="float: right; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; clear:left; width:310px;" class="toccolours" | colspan="2" style="background: #EEE; text-align: center;" | D66 Lijstrekker election |- style="text-align:center;" | style="width:50%;" | _’t Veld_ || style="text-align:center; width:54%;" | _Schaake_ |- style="text-align:center;" | style="width:50%;" | 54% || style="text- align:center; width:50%;" | 45% |- |} Below is the candidate list for the Democrats 66 for the 2019 European Parliament election {|class="wikitable vatop" !
